view.value:
This page that shows your StrongLoop product and feature licenses, along with their expiration date.  You automatically get a free 30-day trial license key that starts the first time you run StrongLoop Arc.  

NOTE: The license Expiration Date currently affects only the Metrics feature.

For more information, see Managing your licenses.

To use features requiring a license for an app running on a remote host, you must push the license to the Process Manager running on the host.  Follow the steps in Setting your license key on a remote host.
